hero.description.welcometotheworldofyatc: Welcome to the world of efficient and streamlined yacht management! Our fully integrated Yacht Management Software is designed to empower yacht owners, captains, and management companies by providing a comprehensive solution to handle all aspects of yacht operations. With our software, you can maximise productivity, enhance safety, and ensure smooth sailing experiences for crew and guests.
testimonial.quote.thisapplication: This application has made my life so much easier as I travel in my yacht. I can now manage my crew, inventory, and finances all in one place.
calltoaction.title.maximiseproductivity: maximise productivity, enhance safety, and ensure smooth sailing experiences for crew and guests
guides.description.oursoftwareis: Our software is designed to support yachts and fleets of all sizes, making it adaptable to your current and future needs.
guides.title.stayinformedabout: Stay informed about your yachts status, crew availability, and financials through real-time updates and notifications.
guides.title.optimisemaintenance: Optimise maintenance and inventory management, reduce downtime, lower repair costs, and improve financial control.
guides.title.oursoftwareis: Our software is designed to support yachts and fleets of all sizes, making it adaptable to your current and future needs.
settings.workspace.manage.label: Manage your workspace settings
settings.workspace.delete.message: The workspace will be permanently deleted, including its contents and domains. This action is irreversible and can not be undone.

settings.workspace.delete.data.warning: Your workspace will be deleted, along with all of its contents.
settings.workspace.delete.final.message: This action is not reversible. Please be certain.

settings.workspace.slug.validation.messa: Please use 16 characters at maximum. Hyphenated alphanumeric characters only.

settings.domain.empty.message: Once you've added your domain on Dayboard Hub, that domain will show up here

You'll be able to invite everyone later!
